protocol.name: P-GSE23027-1
text: VALUE = Signal calculated by GCOS software

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-2
protocol.text: Inflorescence tissue was harvested and frozen in liquid nitrogen.

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-3
protocol.text: Mixed-stage Arabidopsis inflorescences were collected from Col-0 and xrn4-5 plants grown under long day conditions (16 hr light, 8 hr dark) at 21C.

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the Qiagen RNeasy plant kit according to manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared from 15 ug total RNA using the GeneChip IVT labeling kit from Affymetrix.

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 20 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45C on the GeneChip ATH1 Array.

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner.

protocol.name: P-GSE23027-8
protocol.text: Data were analyzed by the GCOS software package using Affymetrix default analysis settings and global scaling as the normalization method.
